heading: # Mutation observer
headingText: The `v-mutate` directive utilizes the [Mutation Observer API](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/MutationObserver). It provides an easy to use interface for detecting when elements are updated.

usage.desc: By default the `v-mutate` directive will enable all available options in the [Mutation Observer API](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/MutationObserver). This can be modified in one of two ways. You can either pass in object with keys for **handler** and **options** or use the _modifier_ property of the directive, `v-mutate.attr.sub="onMutate"`

once.heading: ### Modifiers
once.desc: The `v-mutate` directive accepts modifiers for all of the available options in the [Mutation Observer API](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/MutationObserver). For brevity, abbreviations are usedâ€”**attr** (attributes), **child** (childList), **sub** (subtree) and **char** (characterData).

options.modifiers.once: Will only invoke the provided user callback once, then directive will be unbound.
options.modifiers.attr: Sets the value of [attributes](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/MutationObserverInit/attributes) to true.
options.modifiers.child: Sets the value of [childList](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/MutationObserverInit/childList) to true.
options.modifiers.char: Sets the value of [characterData](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/MutationObserverInit/characterData) to true.
options.modifiers.sub: Sets the value of [subtree](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/MutationObserver/observe#Parameters) to true.
options.value: The function to invoke when the target element is updated.
